items.sentence: You can use margarine as a substitute for butter.
You and I both know Tom doesn\'t want to do that.
You aren\'t really planning to help Tom, are you?
You can\'t bring that stuff into a hospital room.
Why don\'t you just tell us what\'s on your mind?
Tom and Mary are going to leave tomorrow morning.
Tom and Mary are no longer married to each other.
Why didn\'t the band play the song you requested?
Why didn\'t you tell us that there was a witness?
Why do you think soccer isn\'t popular in the US?
Why don\'t we settle the matter once and for all?
I hear a lot of girls wear bikinis at that beach.
I heard that you ate steak for dinner last night.
I heard that you had a date with Tom. How was it?
I just wanted to know what time Tom would arrive.
I\'ll put the kettle on and we\'ll have some tea.
As soon as Tom finished eating, he left for work.
Be careful not to make your decision too quickly.
Can I go with you the next time you go to Boston?
Can you drive me to the airport tomorrow morning?
